title: Glenn’s Had Enough | Guests: Sen. Ted Cruz & Lt. Col. Allen West | 11/12/20
description:
Glenn’s latest special didn’t go as planned. Will any consequences ever come from all his work exposing corruption? Can people move to Georgia just to vote in its Senate runoffs? Sen. Ted Cruz breaks down the latest on Georgia and what it really means if Democrats control the Senate. Lt. Col. Allen West reviews how Texas kept – and can stay – red. Ticketmaster plans to roll out COVID-19 requirements to attend events. Glenn gives the Venezuelan timeline from success to socialism and announces a new Mercury One initiative. A Yugoslavian woman has a terrifying warning for America. Joe Biden’s chief of staff pick once dismissed the coronavirus. Glenn predicts globalists won’t be happy about the new vaccines coming out.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
